entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:28 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 10:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 3.6°C
Wind: ENE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
